current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Public Health Services Act and the Social
		  Security Act to extend health information technology assistance eligibility to
		  behavioral health, mental health, and substance abuse professionals and
		  facilities, and for other purposes.
